mapper.select: select id, pass, mnum, type, name, gender, email, phone, birthday, career, image, reg_date, up_date, del_date, del_yn from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass} and del_yn='N'
select count(*) from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass} and del_yn='N'
select id from member where email=#{email} and name=#{name} and phone=#{phone} and del_yn='N'
